title: Beveled font
content:
Can anyone please Id this font? Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112421/http:/typophile.com/files/image_72.jpg) | 72.67 KB |
author: NZTrent

comments.content: Most probably a custom logo work by [dn&co](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112421/http:/dnco.com/carlton-sw1.html). Looks like they mixed [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112421/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/avenir) (mainly because of /C and /R) and [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112421/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura) (/S looks pretty dead on) then beveled it. This [PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112421/http:/www.carltonsw1.com/downloads/CarltonSW1_Brochure.pdf) embeds the original woodmark as vector, no font.
